data.title: Halliburton Surveying & Mapping
data.meta_description: HSM provides quality services like construction layout and ALTA/boundary surveys with its team of professionals and the ability to utilize 3D Scanning/Aerial LiDAR
data.text:
Ensuring that our quality services are completed right the first time pays dividends.

Over the past 10+ years in business, we have been fortunate to represent a number of interesting and challenging projects.

Mazda/Toyota Automotive &

Multiple Onsite Suppliers

Huntsville, AL

Provided miscellaneous construction layout services, control and existing surveys for MTMUS and three other onsite Tier 1 suppliers. We're working for 5 different general and subcontractors onsite.

Topre America Corporation

Stamping Facility

Smyrna, TN

Provided multiple boundary and topographic surveys, legal descriptions, and other project assistance as needed, located on and off site of the Nissan Motor Manufacturing Company's property.

Honda Manufacturing of Alabama

Lincoln, AL

Installation and management of a fully automated deformation monitoring system for real-time structural measurements, data reporting and other activities.

Mitchell Plastics- Addition

Huntville, AL

Established building control network, as-is condition surveying, structural layout and as built survey of a 130,000 square foot expansion.

Fujita Vuteq USA

Huntsville, AL

Established building control, structural layout and structural as built on the $60 million dollar facility.

Oakwood University

Huntsville, AL

Provided multiple topographic and utility surveys across the campus from 2015-2019.

www.oakwood.com

Alabama A & M- Carter Hall

Huntsville, AL

Provided construction layout services sidewalks and curb.

www.aamu.com

Austin Peay State University

Fine Arts Center

Clarksville, TN

Provided construction layout for the site control, deep foundation, columns, sidewalks and curb.

www.apsu.edu

Calhoun Community College

STEM Facility

Huntsville, AL

Provided QA/QC surveys for the following building components: layout points for columns, verified buildingâ€™s overall location and orientation to project control, and submitted an as built survey for the location of over 100 anchor bolts for columns.

www.calhoun.ed

Redstone Arsenal

Huntsville, AL

(Federal)

Completed dozens of topographic surveys, as built, layout and boundary surveys for both secured and unsecured large project sites throughout the arsenal and including over 700 acres of area. We are currently working for 8 different prime contractors, subcontractors and/or subconsultants on the arsenal. Our projects have also included the development and management of geographic information systems (GIS) on multiple projects.

Arnold Air Force Base

Tullahoma, TN

(Federal)

Provided multiple topographic and utility surveys around supersonic wind tunnel areas and other site facilities within the base.

Huntsville Aquatics Center

Huntsville, AL

(Municipal)

Provided competition pool layout and as built certification.

Guntersville Water & Sewer Board

Guntersville, AL

(Municipal)

Provided bore holes layout over levee systems and over the Spring Creek waterway.

NASA Test Stand 4697

Marshall Space Flight Center

Huntsville, AL

(Federal)

Provided site control, deep foundation layout and as built on a new rocket test stand for the Space Launch System (SLS) project.

Holmes Avenue Parking Deck

Huntsville, AL

(Municipal)

Provided site boundary and topographic and adjoining right-of-way surveys, as well as legal descriptions for multiple easement and right-of-way vacations, and subdivision platting for the $14 million dollar multi-purpose project.

Proposed Federal Courthouse

Huntsville, AL

(Federal)

Boundary, topographic, utility and right-of-way surveying of the proposed project site.

Dekalb/Cherokee County Gas District, Ft. Payne, AL

(Municipal)

Staked curb, storm and sanitary sewer for a new district office.

Times Plaza on South Parkway

Huntsville, AL

Provided initial boundary and topographic surveying, title review, elevation certificates, structural layout, LOMR-F, legal descriptions and as built surveys for a $60 million dollar multi-use building developement.

Redstone Federal Credit Union

Huntsville, AL

Provided building control, structural layout and as builts for the 5 story 67,000 sq. ft. multi-tenant office building and associated 4-story parking garage.

Intergraph Corporate Headquarters

A Hexagon Company

Huntsville, AL

Provided hardscape and retaining wall layout for the front and rear plaza areas and as well as sidewalk layout on this $50 million dollar project.

Jefferson Street Hotel (Curio)

Huntsville, AL

Provided boundary, topographic, ALTA/NSPS Land Title Surveying, project control network, structural layout and as built for a proposed $33 million dollar development.

TopGolf Huntsville

Huntsville, AL

Provided project control network, mass grading topographic surveying, construction and structural layout, as builts and ALTA/NSPS Land Title Surveying on an $18 million dollar facility.

Toyota Field (Baseball Field)

Madison, AL

Established site control and structural layout and as builts on a $50 million dollar baseball facility.

DC Blox

Huntsville, AL

New data center site. Provided topographic, boundary and pre plus post construction ALTA/NSPS Land Title Surveys as well as control layout for construction.

Holmes Avenue Parking Deck

Huntsville, AL

Provided site boundary and topographic and adjoining right-of-way surveys, as well as legal descriptions for multiple easement and right-of-way vacations, and subdivision platting for the $14 million dollar multi-purpose project.

Rocket Engine Manufacturing Facility

Huntsville, AL

Provided Building control, structural layout and as builts surveying, electrical panel/stub and crane column layout for a new 370,000 sq. ft. manufacturing facility, a $250 million dollar development. As built survey on an existing long-term leased Rocket Test Stand, situated on the NASA MSFC campus at Redstone Arsenal.

Food Industry Facility

Transformation Project

Fayetteville, TN

Provided project control network, multiple site topographic and utility surveys, as-is condition surveying of structural components with existing facility, structural layout and anchor bolt as built surveys.

Qualitest/PAR Pharmaceuticals

Huntsville, AL

Provided multiple topographic and utility surveys within the sites improved campus. It included making

multiple ties to building and loading dock locations, conditions.

SA Recycling

Decatur, AL

Provided topographic surveying services along an existing rail line and onsite for a rail spur rehabilitation project.

Boeing Company, Inc., Jetplex

Huntsville, AL

Provided project control networks, topographic surveying, precision leveling on floor chambers, utility surveying, layout services and as builts on multiple projects.

DC Blox

Huntsville, AL

New data center site. Provided topographic, boundary and pre plus post construction ALTA/NSPS Land Title Surveys as well as control layout for construction.

Food Industry Facility Project

Pulaski, TN

Provided project control network, boundary survey, topographic and utility surveys of an entire 25-acre fully developed industrial site.

Chemical Plant

Decatur, AL

Provided project control network and miscellaneous construction layout and as builts for a multi-purpose multi-phased project for recycled water and cooling towers.
